name: Trials (Fin Nolimit)
description:
You are a mysterious adventurer looking to become a hero.  You must complete the Hero Trials in order to fulfill your dream as HERO!  

You are dropped off in an unknown land and must find artifacts in order to progress through your trials.  The problem is these artifacts slow you down and make jumping near impossible.  Can you get through the trails and become the HERO you’ve always known you could be? 

CONTROLS

LEFT and RIGHT arrows

SPACEBAR to jump (space again to double jump)

DOWN arrow or S to throw your artifact

This was an absolutely incredible experience that I was able to share with my family.  Thank you all for trying it out.

THANK YOU FOR CHECKING OUT OUR GAME!

My son Elijah Finamore (he is 16) used his tablet and pen to draw *almost* all the graphics and animations!  We used openGameArt for the background and tiles.

My daughter, Jasmine Finamore (wrote the background music for the JAM and played it on the piano)
